website_summaries.verdict: The Canon EOS 6D Mark II improves upon its predecessor with 26-megapixel resolution, improved Live View focus, and a 45-point autofocus system, but its sensor isn't as good as competing models.
pros: Dual Pixel AF in Live view

website_summaries.verdict: Canon's EOS Rebel T7i DSLR offers an improved autofocus system in both standard and Live View modes, giving owners of older Rebels a compelling reason to upgrade.
pros: Dual Pixel AF in Live View

customer_reviews.title: A proper camera at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I think this camera has been unfairly criticised in some parts of the photo media. Although I sometimes find it difficult to tell the difference between the results from this and my 80D, it at least has given me access to some wonderful full frame lenses at their nominal focal lengths. And it just shows how good the 80D is.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm Page

customer_reviews.title: Canon EOS 6D MkII is an excellent introduction to full frame pictures.
customer_reviews.text: Canon EOS 6D MkII bought in a Prime deal for a good price. I am extremely happy with the camera and the pictures it has taken with a Canon EF 24-105 mm f4/L IS II USM Lens (also bought on Amazon).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I managed to buy this just when there was about £100 off, so was priced at £1402.04 for new. Love the camera, the fully articulated screen helps me take more creative shots for my photography. I know some have issues with the features, but for me it does what I need. Would buy another one if there was another discount on it.
customer_reviews.author: SVH

customer_reviews.title: Full frame DSLR that you don’t have to sell body parts for
customer_reviews.text: Great entry level full frame camera. Good for astrophotography with the flippy screen. Picks up HA nebulae quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Hybrid for Images and Video
customer_reviews.text: Similar specs to the Canon 80d, however it's worth the extra investment to take you to a full-frame sensor. Canon colour science is next to none and the flip-out screen is excellent for vlogging, and taking photos at multiple angles. The battery inside will easily outlast a full day's work. This is excellent value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew F.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: very poor picture and video quality. No option to contact though it gives a 2 year guarantee period.
customer_reviews.author: Kenley

customer_reviews.title: superb images
customer_reviews.text: great pictures but will not connect to my new phone it did with my old phone and my 70d will connect but overall very good camera
customer_reviews.author: mr jason p austin

customer_reviews.title: Didn't receive a charging cable
customer_reviews.text: Everything else was included but the package didn't seem to have a charging cable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Took this on my hols to Australia at the start of the year and was really impressed with the photos I came back with. Especially twilight shots and I got a huge number of stars in a landscape photo of Perth city centre with a full moon in the middle of the photo!! It is a bit heavy especially bolted to a full frame lens so is a bit cumbersome for walking around with, but if you are used to holding a DSLR it isn't anything more than any other camera. Overall I am very happy with it - especially the swivel rear screen, it really makes taking photos from strange angles easy.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Loving my new camera
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from cropped frame SLR to full frame on this model. There are many other in depth reviews on Amazon and other video sites that swayed my choice. Make lots of price comparisons before you buy as I found it cheaper to buy body only and add the lens that suited my needs rather than to go with the body and kit lens option.
customer_reviews.author: Catman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I had a 6D and I updated to the Mark II, best camera ever, flip screen is super useful, touch screen as well. Awesome build quality as always, video side improved, not the best but is good, 1080p at 60fps is really handy. Compact compared other full frame dslr, so perfect for travel. Amazon Delivery on time as usual, great service all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Dal Soglio

customer_reviews.title: So far so fab
customer_reviews.text: So far it looks like a great camera but I am coming to Full frame from an enthusiastic amateur on ASPC - exactly who this was designed for.
customer_reviews.author: Tom O'Kelly

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for the camera, none for the seller.
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for the camera which I love, however none for the seller. (I pre-ordered this camera from this seller on the 18th Aug 2017, and my expected date of delivery at the time of ordering was it's realise date the 23rd Aug 2017. However they were unable to deliver it then and changed my expected date of delivery on 23rd Aug. I finally received this camera on the 6th October 2017.) The camera is great, I am very pleased with it and it was a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: M. N

customer_reviews.title: Very underestimated Camera that just works well!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a Canon 6d mk ii now for a while, and I must say (despite many negative reviews) this is a fantastic cameras! Far better than my 5d mk ii by a country mile!. Pictures need very little post imaging as generally the pictures straight out of the camera are great! People moan about the focussing points are grouped around the middle, no issue for 95+% of photos taken. The touchscreen works well and that has focus points around the whole screen! If you understand photographic theory, are familiar with your kit, and practice photography, you can get a good photo out of any camera!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hagyard

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful camera
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t get this from amazon but had on interest free credit from Jessops. Brilliant camera . I went from a cropped frame and can definately see the difference in quality (although I still carry around my 750d for the lenses I have ) . It’s easy enough to use and I’m always amazed by the results .
customer_reviews.author: C. Cockburn
